description: This is the main entry point file for a React-based frontend application. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS stylesheet, and the main App component. It initializes the React application by mounting it to the DOM element with id 'root' and renders the App component within React.StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to facilitate rendering of React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React element tree into the specified DOM node.
